title: Peter Hurley's ALS Ice Bucket Challenge
summary: Photographer Peter Hurley accepts the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge, dedicating his participation to Kevin Swan and encouraging donations to the A Life Story Foundation before nominating colleagues.

steps.action: Introduction and dedication to Kevin Swan
Call to action for donations to alifestoryfoundation.org
Preparation by putting on a helmet and readying a handheld camera
Execution of the Ice Bucket Challenge (water dumped from above)
Nomination of Lee Morris, Patrick Hall, and August Goldman

key_takeaways: Raise awareness for ALS by participating in the challenge.
Encourage donations to foundations supporting ALS research.
Nominate friends and colleagues to continue the viral campaign.
